name: Sussy Fish
description:
(Open game in fullscreen)

Get some friends together and dive deep into the sea

Explore the old Ship wreckage

Race to collect the most weapons

Become the Pirate and Hunt the Crewmates to win

as a crewmate, Stun the Pirate and Evade to win

Game Features

Up to 2 or 3 or 4 local players

Old-school fashion gameplay all players are gathered around one keyboard

Fast-Paced matches around 1-2mins long

The controls are shown inside the game for all the players.


Also The project is open source:

https://github.com/fishfight/sussy

Please Note: The Online build is just for testing and requires a local Nakama server running to work when opening multiple instances of the same game.
